description: Applies adversarial analysis to test assumptions, identify vulnerabilities, and strengthen proposals by actively looking for flaws. This decorator simulates how an opponent or critic would evaluate and attack ideas, plans, or arguments.

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description: How aggressive or challenging the red team analysis should be

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: Specific aspects to focus the red team analysis on

parameters.name: constructive
parameters.description: Whether to include constructive suggestions for improvement after critiques

examples.description: Basic red team analysis of a business proposal
examples.usage:
+++RedTeam
Here's our plan to launch a new subscription service...
examples.result: Analyzes the subscription service plan from an adversarial perspective, identifying potential weaknesses, oversights, and challenges

examples.description: Aggressive red team analysis with specific focus areas
examples.usage:
+++RedTeam(strength=aggressive, focus=[security,scalability,market-fit], constructive=true)
Review our new authentication system design.
examples.result: Aggressively challenges the authentication system design, specifically targeting security, scalability, and market-fit concerns, followed by constructive improvement suggestions
